title: Deny Me
description: As soon as I laid eyes on my best friend’s brother, I knew I had to discover what sparks behind that brooding stare.I make it my mission to tease Jameson King every chance I get--luring him into temptation. He denies the passion simmering between us, bubbling under the surface of every game we play.But all that changes during a week in Jamaica.There’s no more denying what we both want.Paradise made falling into bed easy, but falling in love is out of the question.
author: Fiona Cole
